subject: Self Care
title: The Inner Critic
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Inner Critic.

hook.text: You give a great presentation. Your inner critic replays the one stumble for hours. Success was invisible.

buildup.text: The inner critic evolved to keep us safe by spotting threats. But in modern life, it overdoes its job.

discovery.text: Self-awareness means noticing the critic's voice without believing it. The thought is real; the content is often not.

twist.text: People with high EQ don't silence the critic. They acknowledge it, evaluate it, and choose whether to agree.

climax.text: When the critic speaks, ask: 'Is this helpful or just harsh?' Helpful feedback stays. Harsh noise goes.

punchline.text: Hear the critic. Evaluate it. Don't obey blindly.

quiz.question: How should self-aware people handle the inner critic?
options: Acknowledge it, evaluate it, then decide whether to agree
